name: Super Bob's World: New Game
description:
Welcome to Bob's World!
The game is a new exciting adventure game full of Bob. Your mission in this journey is to help Bob defeat all enemies who are blocking the way through the lands
Join the game and help Bob overcome ugly monsters and see what fascinating surprise challenges await you in this exciting adventure.
HOW TO PLAY:
+ Use the buttons to jump, move, shoot.
+ Eat candy hidden under the bricks to become bigger, stronger, faster.
+ Eat fire items lurking under the bricks to shoot and destroy enemies
- Types of items hidden in bricks :
+ Grow-up " (Eat candy) to get bigger.
+ "Fire"( Eat fire) to throw bombs on monsters.
+ "Shield" will protect Bob for a limited time.
FEATURED:
+ Good graphics and sound.
+ Easy and intuitive controls
+ Classic gameplay
Download and play today!
Wish you have fun playing the game!
publishers: THAI HOA TECHNOLOGY AND MEDIA SOLUTION JOINT STOCK COMPANY
